externalflashcompatibility: E-TTL II with EX series Speedlites, wireless multi-flash support (with optional accessory)
isosensitivity: AUTO(100-6400), 100-6400 in 1-stop increments ISO can be expanded to H: 12800 During Movie shooting: Auto (100-6400), 100-6400 (Whole stop increments)
imageprocessing: Highlight Tone Priority Auto Lighting Optimizer (4 settings) Long exposure noise reduction High ISO speed noise reduction (4 settings) Auto Correction of Lens Peripheral illumination Basic+ (Shoot by ambience selection, Shoot by lighting or scene type) Creative filters (Grainy B/W, Soft focus, Toy camera, Miniature effect, Fish-eye) - during image Playback only
sensorcleaning: Manual cleaning and Dust Delete Data acquisition
continuousshooting: Max. Approx. 3fps for approx. 69 JPEG images, 6 images RAW
afassistbeam: Intermittent firing of built-in flash or emitted by optional dedicated Speedlite
batterylife: Approx. 500 (at 23Â°C, AE 50%, FE 50%) Approx. 410 (at 0Â°C, AE 50%, FE 50%)
redeyereduction: Yes - with red eye reduction lamp
afsystempoints: 9 AF points (f/5.6 cross type at centre)
drivemodes: Single, Continuous, Self timer (2s, 10s+remote, 10s + continuous shots 2-10)
meteringmodes: TTL full aperture metering with 63-zone SPC (1) Evaluative metering (linked to all AF points) (2) Partial metering at center (approx. 10% of viewfinder) (3) Center weighted average metering
aelock: Auto: In 1-shot AF mode with evaluative metering exposure is locked when focus is achieved. Manual: By AE lock button in creative zone modes.
focallength: Equivalent to 1.6x the focal length of the lens
directprint: Canon Compact Photo Printers and PIXMA Printers supporting PictBridge
interface: Hi-speed USB, Video output (PAL/ NTSC) (integrated with USB terminal), HDMI mini output (HDMI-CEC compatible)
shuttertype: Electronically-controlled focal-plane shutter, with electronic first curtain
otherfeatures: Custom  functions (11 custom functions with 33 settings), metadata tag,  intelligent orientation sensor, playback zoom, display formats, slide  show, histogram, highlight alert, image erase/protection, firmeare  update
shutterspeed: 30-1/4000 sec (1/2 or 1/3 stop increments), Bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode)
shootingmodes: Scene  Intelligent Auto, No Flash, Creative Auto, Portrait, Landscape,  Close-up, Sports, Night Portrait, Movie, Program AE , Shutter priority  AE, Aperture priority AE, Manual
aflock: Locked when shutter button is pressed half way in One Shot AF mode
picturestyles: Auto, Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome, User Defined (x3)
